misc: Has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades.
biography: Mikko is a formidable competitor known for his unwavering focus and strategic prowess on the golf course. Representing Lakeside Golf Vammala, Mikko brings a wealth of experience to the Hector Trophée, preparing to make his eleventh appearance in 2025.

Off the course, Mikko is a character known for his... colorful personal life, having famously planted his seeds in four different women across four different decades. This personal history adds an intriguing layer to his public persona, contrasting with his disciplined approach to golf.

Despite his experience, Mikko is still looking for his first Hector Trophée win, and has yet to capture the Victor Trophy. It remains to be seen whether 2025 will be his year to finally break through.
